Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Vincennes, 83rd and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Vincennes, 83rd and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Western (CN). Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Western (CN).

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
